definition: to bow and scrape/to act servilely
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: A man apologizes when he’s wrong, but he will grovel before no one.
sentences.chinese: 一个人犯了错该向人道歉，但不应该卑躬屈节。

definition: servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
to bow down to everything sb says or does/to act submissively in order to ingratiate oneself
to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
to fawn on/to ingratiate oneself/(literary) to meet face to face
to fawn on/to kiss up to
to deign/to condescend/to yield to (entreaties)/to submit to (sb)/(polite) to deign to accept (a post)
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
lit. to cling to the high, connect to the rich (idiom); to try to attach oneself to the rich and powerful/social climbing
